head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CAVANAGH, DORIS V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CAVANAGH, DORIS V.

block.p: CAVANAGH-Doris V. (Ret. NY Telephone Co.). Beloved wife of Gerard. Devoted mother of Barbara Cavanagh-Farley and son-inlaw, Thomas G. Farley. Reposing Martin A. Gleason Funeral Home, 149-20 Northern Blvd., Flushing, NY. Mass of Christian Burial, St. Joan of Arc R.C. Church, Friday, 9:30 AM. Visiting Thursday 2-5 and 7-10 PM. In lieu of flowers, memorial donations to the Alzheimer's Foundation would be appreciated.
